channel.title: Pages on A L I C E • L I N
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on A L I C E • L I N

item.title: Design
item.description: Asides from geospatial work, I also enjoy various creative pursuits such as graphic design, illustration, and motion graphics. Science Communication I created animations (here and here) for my geospatial work at the NASA DEVELOP program. Daily Bruin I was the graphics editor and graphics senior staff at the Daily Bruin, UCLA’s national award-winning newspaper. I managed and trained reporters to produce daily infographics to accompany stories as well as standalones.
